Definition: In this task, you will be given a news article. Your task is to classify the article into one of the four topics: 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', or 'Sci/Tech'. If the article's main topic is relevant to the world, sports, business, or science/technology, respectively, then choose that option. If you are not sure about the topic, choose the closest option. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].

Positive Examples.explanation: The topic of the news article is relevant to science(astronomy). Hence, the label is 'Sci/Tech'.
